segment.source: History Window
segment.target: History Window

segment.source: History Window
segment.target: History Window

segment.source: History Window
segment.target: History Window

segment.source: The history of a Group Policy object (GPO) can be displayed by double-clicking a GPO or by right-clicking a GPO and then clicking History.
segment.target: The history of a Group Policy object (GPO) can be displayed by double-clicking a GPO or by right-clicking a GPO and then clicking History.

segment.source: It is also displayed in the Group Policy Management Console (GPMC) as a tab for each GPO.
segment.target: It is also displayed in the Group Policy Management Console (GPMC) as a tab for each GPO.

segment.source: The history provides a list of all versions of the selected GPO saved within the archive.
segment.target: The history provides a list of all versions of the selected GPO saved within the archive.

segment.source: From the History window, you can obtain a report of the settings within a GPO, compare multiple versions of a GPO, or roll back to a previous version of a GPO.
segment.target: From the History window, you can obtain a report of the settings within a GPO, compare multiple versions of a GPO, or roll back to a previous version of a GPO.

segment.source: Filtering events in the History window
segment.target: Filtering events in the History window

segment.source: The tabs within the History window filter the events displayed.
segment.target: The tabs within the History window filter the events displayed.

segment.source: Tabs
segment.target: Tabs

segment.source: Filtering
segment.target: Filtering

segment.source: Show All
segment.target: Show All

segment.source: Display all versions of the GPO.
segment.target: Display all versions of the GPO.

segment.source: Checked In
segment.target: Checked In

segment.source: Display only checked-in versions of the GPO.
segment.target: Display only checked-in versions of the GPO.

segment.source: The deployed version is omitted from this list.
segment.target: The deployed version is omitted from this list.

segment.source: Labels Only
segment.target: Labels Only

segment.source: Display only GPOs that have labels associated with them.
segment.target: Display only GPOs that have labels associated with them.

segment.source: Event information
segment.target: Event information

segment.source: Information is provided for each event in the history of the selected GPO.
segment.target: Information is provided for each event in the history of the selected GPO.

segment.source: GPO Characteristic
segment.target: GPO Characteristic

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Computer
segment.target: Computer

segment.source: Automatically generated version of the Computer Configuration portion of the GPO.
segment.target: Automatically generated version of the Computer Configuration portion of the GPO.

segment.source: User
segment.target: User

segment.source: Automatically generated version of the User Configuration portion of the GPO.
segment.target: Automatically generated version of the User Configuration portion of the GPO.

segment.source: Time
segment.target: Time

segment.source: Timestamp of the version of the GPO when the action in the status field was performed.
segment.target: Timestamp of the version of the GPO when the action in the status field was performed.

segment.source: State
segment.target: State

segment.source: The state of the selected version of the GPO:
segment.target: The state of the selected version of the GPO:

segment.source: Deployed: This version of the GPO is currently live in the production environment.
segment.target: Deployed: This version of the GPO is currently live in the production environment.

segment.source: Checked In: This version of the GPO is available for authorized Editors to check out for editing or for a Group Policy administrator to deploy.
segment.target: Checked In: This version of the GPO is available for authorized Editors to check out for editing or for a Group Policy administrator to deploy.

segment.source: Checked Out: This version of the GPO is currently checked out by an Editor and is unavailable for other Editors.
segment.target: Checked Out: This version of the GPO is currently checked out by an Editor and is unavailable for other Editors.

segment.source: (The checked out state is not recorded in the History except to indicate if a GPO is currently checked out.)
segment.target: (The checked out state is not recorded in the History except to indicate if a GPO is currently checked out.)

segment.source: Created: Identifies the date and time of the initial creation of the GPO.
segment.target: Created: Identifies the date and time of the initial creation of the GPO.

segment.source: Labeled: Identifies a labeled version of the GPO.
segment.target: Labeled: Identifies a labeled version of the GPO.

segment.source: GPO Status
segment.target: GPO Status

segment.source: The Computer Configuration and the User Configuration can be managed separately from each other.
segment.target: The Computer Configuration and the User Configuration can be managed separately from each other.

segment.source: This status shows which portions of the GPO are enabled.
segment.target: This status shows which portions of the GPO are enabled.

segment.source: Owner
segment.target: Owner

segment.source: The person who checked in or deployed the GPO.
segment.target: The person who checked in or deployed the GPO.

segment.source: Comment
segment.target: Comment

segment.source: A comment entered by the owner of a GPO at the time that this version was modified.
segment.target: A comment entered by the owner of a GPO at the time that this version was modified.

segment.source: Useful for identifying the specifics of the version in case of the need to roll back to a previous version.
segment.target: Useful for identifying the specifics of the version in case of the need to roll back to a previous version.

segment.source: Reports
segment.target: Reports

segment.source: Depending on whether a single GPO version or multiple GPO versions are selected, the Settings and Differences buttons display reports on GPO settings.
segment.target: Depending on whether a single GPO version or multiple GPO versions are selected, the Settings and Differences buttons display reports on GPO settings.

segment.source: Right-clicking GPO versions provides the option to display XML-based reports as well.
segment.target: Right-clicking GPO versions provides the option to display XML-based reports as well.

segment.source: Button
segment.target: Button

segment.source: Effect
segment.target: Effect

segment.source: Settings
segment.target: Settings

segment.source: Generate an HTML-based report displaying the settings within the selected version of the GPO.
segment.target: Generate an HTML-based report displaying the settings within the selected version of the GPO.

segment.source: Differences
segment.target: Differences

segment.source: Generate an HTML-based report comparing the settings within multiple selected versions of the GPO.
segment.target: Generate an HTML-based report comparing the settings within multiple selected versions of the GPO.

segment.source: Key to difference reports
segment.target: Key to difference reports

segment.source: Symbol
segment.target: Symbol

segment.source: Meaning
segment.target: Meaning

segment.source: Color
segment.target: Color

segment.source: None
segment.target: None

segment.source: Item exists with identical settings in both GPOs
segment.target: Item exists with identical settings in both GPOs

segment.source: Varies with level
segment.target: Varies with level

segment.source: Item exists in both GPOs, but with changed settings
segment.target: Item exists in both GPOs, but with changed settings

segment.source: Blue
segment.target: Blue

segment.source: Item exists only in the first GPO
segment.target: Item exists only in the first GPO

segment.source: Red
segment.target: Red

segment.source: Item exists only in the second GPO
segment.target: Item exists only in the second GPO

segment.source: Green
segment.target: Green

segment.source: For items with changed settings, the changed settings are identified when the item is expanded.
segment.target: For items with changed settings, the changed settings are identified when the item is expanded.

segment.source: The value for the attribute in each GPO is displayed in the same order that the GPOs are displayed in the report.
segment.target: The value for the attribute in each GPO is displayed in the same order that the GPOs are displayed in the report.

segment.source: Some changes to settings may cause an item to be reported as two different items (one present only in the first GPO, one present only in the second), rather than as one item that has changed.
segment.target: Some changes to settings may cause an item to be reported as two different items (one present only in the first GPO, one present only in the second), rather than as one item that has changed.
